title: Aquatic Rek'sai
body:
I feel like this is just to obvious. But I feel like it has to be done. 
Her "Q" could be very similar and look exactly the same just a re color.
The underground "Q" you can shoot a tiny wave. 
For her w she could have the fun stick out of the water like you see in jaws evt.
When coming out of the "water/ground" she can be doing the generic lunge where the shark flies out of the water. The bite into more of a sideway shark like bite.
The tunnels can be replaced with whirlpool. Rek'sai could ride a wave for her ult. 

     I haven't seen anything like this I think this would be a great skin for Rek'sai.

replies.body: Eh, to me the whole appeal of Rek'sai is that she's a shark, but on the land.  Taking away the land part pretty much just makes her, you know, a shark.
